data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/hjmKqTwOIwN52RBGM72bLSq9Gay.jpg","id":76115,"title":"The Phantom of the Opera at the Royal Albert Hall","original_title":"The Phantom of the Opera at the Royal Albert Hall","overview":"A disfigured musical genius, hidden away in the Paris Opera House, terrorises the opera company for the unwitting benefit of a young protégée whom he trains and loves. Jean Valjean, a man imprisoned for stealing bread, must flee a relentless policeman named Javert. The pursuit consumes both men's lives, and soon Valjean finds himself in the midst of the student revolutions in France.","poster_path":"/6CuzBs2Lb8At7qQr64mLXg2RYRb.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[36,18],"popularity":51.4,"release_date":"2012-12-18","video":false,"vote_average":7.334,"vote_count":5196},{"backdrop_path":"/r1vuCBErBAN0PXzIim7jC0FiFMb.jpg","id":8981,"title":"Dear Frankie","original_title":"Dear Frankie","overview":"Nine-year-old Frankie and his single mum Lizzie have been on the move ever since Frankie can remember, most recently arriving in a seaside Scottish town. Wanting to protect her deaf son from the truth that they've run away from his father, Lizzie has invented a story that he is away at sea on the HMS Accra. Every few weeks, Lizzie writes Frankie a make-believe letter from his father, telling of his adventures in exotic lands. As Frankie tracks the ship's progress around the globe, he discovers that it is due to dock in his hometown. With the real HMS Accra arriving in only a fortnight, Lizzie must choose between telling Frankie the truth or finding the perfect stranger to play Frankie's father for just one day...","poster_path":"/5YRDvaBWBbhTKBYYc7BoOWdW01N.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,10751],"popularity":22.063,"release_date":"2004-05-18","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":187},{"backdrop_path":"/d8yE2GKtplZXXzgJ9151hV9nArD.jpg","id":15855,"title":"Phantom of the Opera","original_title":"Phantom of the Opera","overview":"Following a tragic accident that leaves him disfigured, crazed composer Erique Claudin transformed into a masked phantom who schemes to make beautiful young soprano Christine Dubois the star of the opera and wreak revenge on those who stole his music.","poster_path":"/2IPsMihA1JNUnZbYpHZ93avZdW7.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,10749,18],"popularity":15.068,"release_date":"1943-08-12","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":187},{"backdrop_path":"/6cfgXv2jEDTwTNlJyrkgEtPzxqz.jpg","id":10831,"title":"The Draughtsman's Contract","original_title":"The Draughtsman's Contract","overview":"A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.","poster_path":"/ljeTWR2kowGXijMc8LMuy72ULM3.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[36,9648,35],"popularity":15.185,"release_date":"1982-11-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.1,"vote_count":221},{"backdrop_path":"/wVPh9Oxv8e1IzgTYohlPlWqSWlu.jpg","id":351981,"title":"Bear Story","original_title":"Historia de un oso","overview":"An old bear goes out every day to a busy street corner. In a bid to win back her love, the Phantom lures Christine, her husband Raoul, and their young son Gustave from Manhattan, to the glittering and glorious world of Coney Island... they have no idea what lies in store for them...","poster_path":"/hc50HF87HFKeMPmCY1Cwv48FE3v.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,10402,10749],"popularity":6.658,"release_date":"2012-02-08","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":52},{"backdrop_path":"/96etD6qTLBfoGYZsLb9AAcSETjE.jpg","id":20379,"title":"Grand Prix","original_title":"Grand Prix","overview":"The most daring drivers in the world have gathered to compete for the 1966 Formula One championship.
